reviews.review: Fun puzzle game that also had robots talking trash to you. The multiplayer is also lots of fun with the robots still talking trash to you.
It's a really fun game. The puzzles and japes are also good brain teasers.

I love this game...      I got it for about 2.00 and it is amazing. With one of the best endings in any 2011 released game...  It has a lot of replay value in the form of level editing, Steam Workshop, and a two player co-op mode... The story; however, stills gets to me, like how Portal 1 did!! I really recommend this to anyone looking for a great storytelling, puzzle Potato-Filled game...

Oh Portal, Portal, Portal. Qué obra maestra.

Portal, una verdadera obra de Valve. Especialmente el segundo juego. 
Portal 2 es de esos juegos en los que sumerges en sus personajes e historia. Desde GLaDOS y su antipatía hasta la traición de Wheatley; te hacen pensar esto: ¿Que pasaría si yo estuviese?
A este juego le tengo mucho cariño ya que fue el primero que me compré. Aunque tenga cariño no significa que le esté haciendo la pelota, pero es que es increíble. 

Puzzles nuevos, historia renovada, personajes nuevos, gameplay inmersivo.....
Respecto a Portal 1, Portal 2 es una directa mejora  sobre los gráficos, motor del juego y funciones. Aunque se me hace repetitivo hacer las pruebas, ya que solo te entretienes en los puntos fuertes de la historia.
De todos modos me sigue encantando.


Y ahora el punto caliente: EL COOPERATIVO

Horas y horas de diversión con tus amigos. Puzzles, gestos, cosméticos... Se parece incluso al  TF2 (Hasta la tienda xd)
Bueno el cooperativo me ha otorgado muy buenos momentos y es que además de ser largo lo disfrutas jugando con tus amigos

En fin, mi puntuación final para este maravilloso súper juego es: 9'5
¿Por qué?: Yo le pondría un 10 pero como he dicho antes algunas partes se me hacen repetitivas.

Pero al fin de al cabo siempre volveré a pasarme el juego porque es increíble.

Juego Nominado a Premios Steam 2018

Cons:
- No Portal 3
- Need friends to play co-op

This game... if you haven't played it you definitely should, I don't want to give away spoilers, but I fell in love with this game and it murdered me for it, 10/10 would play again.

Also, it isn't necessary to play the first one (the second is longer with more story, better overall), but I would recommend playing the first Portal game before this one to help you understand some of the dialogue a little better.
Not for those who can easily get motion-sick from playing video games.

Great Game

Otra maravilla clasica de Valve, un juego de plataformas con un diseño de niveles que te da varias posibilidades de completar una prueba, aunque al principio es tutorial, asi que estas un poco limitado, igualmente, la pequeña historia e easter eggs que te cuentan de a que va todo lo que esta pasando esta bastante bien. Me pase tanto la historia principal como el cooperativo, el cooperativo esta de puta madre cuando lo pase con mi amigo fue una lucha por como pasar la prueba, quien hacia que, como se hacia, muy divertido la verdad. 9.5/10

In all honesty I should have given this game a posotive review long ago when I first played through it. This game is among my most favorites to play. GLADOS is easily one of my most favorite video game villans right there with Warframe's Ballas and Borderlands 2's handsome Jack. The Co-Op is also very fun. The game is Pretty, Funny, Interesting, and most of all fun. I would say play it and if you got a friend who has it to go though the co-op. just be carful if they try and drop you from a light bridge ;) If you don't have another friend who has it then go with a random person. If I hadn't done so I would never have met one of my coolest friends online. to this day we are always playing games online or just talking and I have this game to thank for bringing us together. This game holds a special place in my heart for the masterpiece that it is and the memories with new friends it helped pave the way for me and him to create. Thank you portal 2 and I greatly reccomend you get it to. :)
Amazing game. Great contiuation of the first. You must play this game.

I've played the story around 3 times and wish they would come out with a portal 3 or a DLC. The community levels can keep your intrest for a while and creating your own levels is fun and makes you apprecitate the story so much more because it shows you how challenging it is to be creative with level design. If you're new to portal I would 100% recommend playing portal 2 first and if you enjoy it go back to the original portal. Just even making the comment makes me want to jump back into the world of portal 2.
